Nina Jobanputra is a current senior at [Harvey Mudd College](https://hmc.edu). Nina has taken many electrical engineering classes; Introduction to analog design, Radio Frequency circuit design, Principles of computer science, Data structures/Program developement and now Microprocessor Systems: Design and Applications. Nina has worked in a variety of fields but after graduation wants to work in medical devices or Biotech as an electrical engineer, but who knows what will happen after this year.
